iden-versio-officer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
iden-versio-officer.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada
iden-versio-officer.expansion: Rebellion in the Rim - Campaign Expansion (SWM31)
iden-versio-officer.name: Iden Versio
iden-versio-officer.ability:
When you resolve the :evade: defense effect, you can cancel 1 die at close range or distance 1.
:squadron:: You may discard this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. That ship gains 1 raid token of your choice.
